You‚Äôre burned out.
something.
Here‚Äôs your solution:
weird little wiki that people actually want to read.
You've got the skills. React? Check.
You‚Äôve probably opened 7 different ‚Äúbuild in public‚Äù projects this year and shipped zero.
You‚Äôre not lazy. You‚Äôre just overloaded.
Let‚Äôs shrink the scope.
A React-based niche wiki solves three problems at once:
‚úÖ You keep coding (lightweight project)

All without turning into a YouTuber or productivity monk.
This isn‚Äôt Wikipedia. This is Weirdipedia.

üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Hacker techniques from the 90s

articles.author: Marzena Pugo
articles.description:
Table of Contents




What is Zabbix and Why Use It?


Key Features That Make Zabbix Stand Out


Setting Up Zabbix on Linux: The Basics


Real-World Cases: How Zabbix Solves Problems


Troubleshooting and Handy Commands


Wrapping Up






If you‚Äôre managing servers, cloud services, or networks, you know things can break fast-and often at the worst times. 
That‚Äôs where Zabbix comes in. 
Zabbix is an open-source monitoring platform built for scale, flexibility, and real-time visibility. 
You can monitor everything from Linux servers to routers, cloud environments, and even containers, all from a single dashboard.
What I love about Zabbix is how it brings order to chaos. 
It keeps an eye on your infrastructure, alerts you when things go sideways, and even lets you automate fixes. 
Whether yo‚Ä¶
articles.title: Zabbix in Linux: Your All-in-One Monitoring Powerhouse

articles.author: Generatecode
articles.description:
Introduction
If you're trying to fetch step count data from Fitbit using Flutter and encountering a PlatformException(CANCELED, User canceled login, null, null), you're not alone. This common issue arises often during the OAuth authentication process and can stem from several factors. In this article, we will explore the cause of this error and provide a step-by-step troubleshooting guide to ensure a successful integration with Fitbit's API.
Understanding the Issue
The error message you‚Äôre seeing indicates that the user canceled the login attempt. This can happen for a number of reasons, even if the user has clicked the 'Allow' button on the Fitbit login page. Here are some frequent causes:
Redirect URI Issues: If the redirect URI isn‚Äôt registered correctly in the Fitbit developer console,‚Ä¶
articles.title: How to Fix Fitbit Authentication Canceled Error in Flutter

articles.author: Tianya School
articles.description:
Webpack Module Federation is a revolutionary feature introduced in Webpack 5 that completely changes the way micro-frontend architecture is implemented. Module Federation allows different web applications (or micro-frontend applications) to dynamically share code at runtime without physical sharing in the traditional packaging or publishing process. This means that each micro-application can be independently developed, built, and deployed, while also being able to easily share components, libraries, and even business logic.
Container application (Container): As the host of the micro-frontend architecture, responsible for loading and coordinating various micro-applications.


Remote application (Remote): An independent micro-application that can expose its own modules to other applications ‚Ä¶
articles.title: Webpack module federation: a new choice for micro front-end architecture

articles.author: Emmanuel Onwuegbusi
articles.description:
In this article, we'll explore how to build an AI agent that can automatically browse the web and perform actions using the Supercog Agentic Framework. This powerful agent combines browser automation with AI vision models to create an intelligent web assistant that can navigate websites, extract information, and perform tasks just like a human would.
Installation
Set up Required API Keys
Running the OSS Operator Agent
Customizing the Agent
Conclusion
Let's install the framework from source to get started:
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/supercog-ai/agentic.git

# Change to the agentic directory
cd agentic

# Create and activate a virtual environment
python -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate  # On Windows: .venv\Scripts\activate

# Install with browser-use dependenc‚Ä¶
articles.title: Build Your Own AI Agent that Can Browse the Web and Take Actions ü§ñ

articles.author: Blackwhite
articles.description:
Introduction
In the age of instant digital communication, users expect web applications to provide seamless, real-time interactions. Whether it's live chat, collaborative document editing, online gaming, or real-time dashboards, responsiveness is key to user satisfaction. Traditional request-response models using HTTP are not always sufficient to meet these demands. This is where WebSockets come into play, offering a full-duplex communication channel over a single TCP connection.
As web application development continues to evolve, the demand for real-time features is growing. Developers are integrating WebSockets to enable two-way communication between clients and servers, enhancing user experiences across industries. Moreover, the convergence of artificial intelligence with real-time appl‚Ä¶
articles.title: Building Real-Time Web Apps with WebSockets: A Developer‚Äôs Guide

articles.author: Christian Alt-Wibbing
articles.description:
"Is software developed or cultivated?" This question brings an intriguing perspective to the world of software development. When we write software, do we follow strict methods, or is it a creative, artistic process? And what does it mean to treat a software system like a garden?
In the debate over whether software development is an art or a science, it quickly becomes clear how much our perspective shapes our thinking and approach. When we see software development as a science, we emphasize structured, reproducible processes and precise results created through clear rules. In science, we often seek the best, reproducible solution, based on data and analysis. In software development, this might mean relying on design patterns, algorithms, and a strict adherence to best practices that stream‚Ä¶
articles.title: Software Development: Art, Science, and Gardening

articles.description:
The Ethereum Foundation, the nonprofit that supports development across the Ethereum blockchain, distributed $32.6 million in grants in the first quarter of 2025.¬†
In an allocation update for Q1 2025, the organization reported spending $32 million on various initiatives through its Ecosystem Support Program (ESP).¬†
Categories included community and educational grants, zero-knowledge and cryptography. Other allocations included execution layers, developer experience and tools, layer-2 networks and overall ecosystem growth and support.¬†

Ethereum Foundation focuses on education and community
Of the 101 grants awarded, 32 went to community and education-focused initiatives. Recipients included educational content creators, conference organizers, bootcamps and hackathons such as ETHPrague and ‚Ä¶
articles.title: Ethereum Foundation distributed $32.6M grants to ecosystem in Q1

articles.description:
Gemini, the cryptocurrency exchange founded by Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, has received regulatory approval to expand crypto derivatives trading across Europe.
Gemini secured a Markets in Financial Instruments Directive II (MiFID II) license from the Malta Financial Services Authority (MFSA), allowing the exchange to offer crypto derivatives in the European Union, it announced on May 9.
‚ÄúOnce we commence business activities, we will be able to offer regulated derivatives throughout the EU and EEA [European Economic Area] under MiFID II,‚Äù said Gemini‚Äôs head of Europe, Mark Jennings.
According to the exec, the MiFID II license is a big milestone in Gemini‚Äôs European expansion, putting it one step closer to offering derivatives to both retail and institutional users.
Advanced traders will g‚Ä¶
articles.title: Gemini to launch crypto derivatives in Europe with new license

articles.description:
What is TapSwap on Telegram?            
            
                
TapSwap is a tap-to-earn Web3 application that lives inside Telegram ‚Äî no separate download required.
Are your crypto friends obsessed with tapping their phones all the time? Welcome to the world of TapSwap. TapSwap is a tap-to-earn game released in mid-2024 in the Telegram Mini Apps ecosystem. The game quickly catches your attention: one minute you‚Äôre just curious‚Ä¶ the next, you‚Äôre tapping away at 2 am trying to squeeze out one more energy boost.¬†
At its core, TapSwap is simple:

You tap your screen.
You earn TAPS tokens.
Repeat.


It‚Äôs built as a Mini App inside Telegram, which means no downloading or setting up complicated wallets just to play. Just hit ‚ÄúStart‚Äù and you‚Äôre in. Launched in early 2024, it quickly amasse‚Ä¶
articles.title: TapSwap on Telegram: Is it legit or a scam?

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Adrian Zmudzinski
articles.description:
Senate Banking Committee Chairman Tim Scott blamed the Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for US Stablecoins (GENIUS) Act‚Äôs failure on partisan politics during a Senate speech on May 8.
Scott said the vote, which failed to reach cloture in the Senate, was expected to mark a step toward greater affordability and innovation. Instead, he said, political divisions took precedence.  
‚ÄúInstead, we witnessed a disappointing display of political gamesmanship that puts partisan politics above policy, and obstruction above innovation, ‚ÄúScott said.
The bill had previously undergone multiple amendments to address concerns raised by Democrats, including stricter requirements for stablecoin issuers and further provisions for Anti-Money Laundering.
Related: Trump tricked into pushing XRP for cr‚Ä¶
articles.title: Senator Tim Scott slams partisan politics for failed stablecoin bill

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Helen Partz
articles.description:
Taiwanese lawmaker Ko Ju-Chun has called on the government to consider adding Bitcoin to its national reserves, suggesting it could serve as a hedge against global economic uncertainty.  
Ko, a legislator at-large in Taiwan‚Äôs legislative body, the Legislative Yuan, took to X on Friday to report that he had advocated Bitcoin (BTC) investment by the Taiwanese government at the National Conference on May 9.
In his remarks, Ko cited Bitcoin‚Äôs potential to become a hedge amid global economic risks and urged Taiwan to recognize the cryptocurrency alongside gold and foreign exchange reserves to boost its financial resilience.
Source: Ko Ju-Chun
Ko‚Äôs announcement came shortly after the legislator held talks with Samson Mow, who advocates for Bitcoin adoption by states like El Salvador at his BTC t‚Ä¶
articles.title: Taiwan lawmaker calls for Bitcoin reserve at national conference

articles.description:

Bitcoin (BTC) is at its highest levels since January, and traders are eyeing key levels to watch for what‚Äôs next.

After hitting $104,000, BTC/USD is retracing to establish support, but the fate of $100,000 is among the concerns for market participants.

Current price action represents an important battleground, as measured from the $75,000 lows this year.


‚Äù Headline driven‚Äù BTC price gains draw scrutiny
Just $6,000 from new all-time highs, per data from Cointelegraph Markets Pro and TradingView, BTC price action has stunned the market by jumping 10% in days.
The pace of the BTC price gains has come as a surprise for many, but longer-term perspectives show where the most difficult battleground lies.
‚ÄúSince this current impulse was primarily headline driven again this puts ma‚Ä¶

Bitcoin was up 4.3% on May 9, after breaking $100,000¬† for the first time since February.

BTC price gains trigger $800 million in short liquidations, the largest since 2021.

A bull flag on the weekly chart suggests a $182,200 target, with analysts predicting Bitcoin‚Äôs price can go as high as $1 million in 2025.

Bitcoin‚Äôs (BTC) price is up 4.3% on May 9 as a fresh liquidity cascade sent BTC price soaring above $100,000 for the first time in over 90 days.

Bitcoin wipes out liquidity in return to 6-figures

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Helen Partz
articles.description:
German law enforcement seized 34 million euros ($38 million) in cryptocurrency from eXch, a cryptocurrency platform allegedly used to launder funds stolen after Bybit‚Äôs record-breaking $1.4 billion hack.
The seizure, announced on May 9 by Germany‚Äôs Federal Criminal Police Office (BKA) and Frankfurt‚Äôs main prosecutor‚Äôs office, involved multiple crypto assets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Litecoin (LTC) and Dash (DASH). The move marks the third-largest crypto confiscation in the BKA‚Äôs history.
The authorities also seized eXch‚Äôs German server infrastructure with over eight terabytes of data and shut down the platform, the announcement added.
eXch exchanged crypto without AML
In the statement, the BKA described eXch as a ‚Äúswapping‚Äù service that allowed users to exchange various crypto‚Ä¶
articles.title: Germany seizes $38M in crypto from Bybit hack-linked eXch exchange

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Bradley Peak
articles.description:
What Pi Network promised            
            
                
When Pi Network first hit the scene in 2019, it had a simple but compelling pitch: What if you could mine cryptocurrency straight from your phone ‚Äî no expensive gear, no massive electricity bills, just a tap a day on an app?
It caught fire. Millions of people jumped on board, lured by the idea of ‚Äúfree‚Äù mobile mining and a chance to get in early on the next big thing. The app made it easy: You signed up, invited a few friends, tapped a button every 24 hours, and watched your Pi (PI) balance slowly grow. With the social referral model fueling growth, it wasn‚Äôt long before over 70 million users had signed up worldwide.

Did you know? Pi Network utilizes the Stellar Consensus Protocol (SCP), which aims for energy efficiency an‚Ä¶
articles.title: Is Pi Network dead? What really went wrong behind the hype

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Jesse Coghlan
articles.description:
Solana has yet to show convincing signs that it could surpass Ethereum as the preferred blockchain for institutions, as its revenue, heavily reliant on memecoins, is considered unstable, according to crypto bank group Sygnum.
In a May 8 blog post, Sygnum said that the current sentiment around Ethereum ‚Äúremains poor,‚Äù with the market focused on Solana‚Äôs ‚Äútransaction volumes and its recent dominance in fee generation.‚Äù
However, Sygnum said ‚Äúthe medium-term outlook will primarily be shaped by traditional financial institutions‚Äô platform choices to bring their product offerings,‚Äù not by sentiment.
‚ÄúWe do not yet see convincing signs that Solana would be the preferred choice as Ethereum‚Äôs security, stability and longevity are highly prized,‚Äù it added.
Sygnum argued that institutions could choos‚Ä¶
articles.title: Solana lacks ‚Äòconvincing signs‚Äô of besting Ethereum: Sygnum

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Martin Young
articles.description:
American fast food outlet Steak ‚Äòn Shake has announced it will begin accepting Bitcoin as payment at all locations starting on May 16.
The firm said on X on May 9 that it was making the cryptocurrency available to more than 100 million customers, adding that ‚Äúthe movement is just beginning,‚Äù before signing off as ‚ÄúSteaktoshi.‚Äù¬†
The fast food chain initially hinted at accepting Bitcoin (BTC) in March when it posted ‚ÄúShould Steak ‚Äòn Shake accept Bitcoin?‚Äù on social media.¬†
The tweet drew the attention of the crypto community and Bitcoin proponents such as Jack Dorsey, who rapidly replied with a ‚Äúyes.‚Äù¬†
The firm has built momentum since then with Bitcoin-themed marketing, Tesla promotions, and visual hints on its social media feeds.
‚ÄúThe future is bright,‚Äù said the firm in April. Source: Stak‚Ä¶
articles.title: Bitcoin accepted at fast food chain Steak ‚Äôn Shake from May 16

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Stephen Katte
articles.description:
Fresh off its most recent Bitcoin purchase, Japanese investment firm Metaplanet is raising more funds through another bond issue to expand its growing crypto treasury.
Through a $21.25 million issue of ‚Äú0% Ordinary Bonds,‚Äù  all the ‚Äúfunds raised will be allocated to the purchase of Bitcoin,‚Äù the firm said in a May 9 statement. 
Zero-coupon bonds don‚Äôt offer any interest to the holder. Most of the time, they are issued at a steep discount from their normal value, and when they mature, the holder receives the full value.
After its most recent May 9 board of directors meeting, the firm said it will issue a 14th Stock Acquisition Rights to EVO Fund, an investment management firm in the Cayman Islands, with a redemption date of Nov. 7.
Source: Metaplanet
At current prices, Metaplanet could buy ‚Ä¶
articles.title: Metaplanet is raising another $21M through bonds to buy more Bitcoin

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Ciaran Lyons
articles.description:
Ether surged 20% in the past 24 hours following the launch of the Pectra upgrade, with some crypto traders suggesting the growing number of ETH long positions could mark a ‚Äúturning point‚Äù for the asset that has faced uncertain sentiment throughout most of 2025.
At the time of publication, Ether (ETH) is trading at $2,230, up 19.6% over the past 24 hours, according to CoinMarketCap data. Pseudonymous crypto trader Daan Crypto Trades said it was a ‚Äúpretty insane candle.‚Äù Over the same 24 hours, Ether Open Interest (OI) spiked 21%.¬†
Ether price pump caught traders offside
The surge followed the long-awaited Pectra Upgrade, which went live on May 7, introducing new wallet features, increased staking limits and scalability improvements to Ethereum. 
Popular crypto trader Alex Kruger said on May‚Ä¶
articles.title: Ether clocks ‚Äòinsane‚Äô 20% candle post Pectra ‚Äî A turning point?

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Stephen Katte
articles.description:
AI decentralized apps (DApps) have seen a spike in user activity and could soon challenge gaming and DeFi for the top spot in the DApp ecosystem, according to blockchain analytics platform DappRadar.
Gaming and DeFi are both sitting on 21% dominance in April, judged by percentage of unique active wallets, while AI has climbed to 16%, up from the 11% recorded in the February report, data in DappRadar‚Äôs April industry report shows.
‚ÄúAs user interest in artificial intelligence tools grows across industries, AI-powered DApps are steadily carving out their place in the decentralized ecosystem,‚Äù DappRadar analyst Sara Gherghelas said.¬†
‚ÄúIf this trend continues, AI could soon challenge the traditional dominance of DeFi and Gaming, signaling a new era in the DApp landscape.‚Äù
AI DApps have seen a j‚Ä¶
articles.title: AI decentralized apps are coming for the Web3 throne: DappRadar

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Martin Young
articles.description:
Apple is reportedly working on its own microchips across multiple product categories, including smart glasses and artificial intelligence ‚Äî a hint at what‚Äôs next for the massive Silicon Valley-based tech giant. 
A May 8 report from Bloomberg, citing people familiar with the matter, said the company is working on new processors to power its future devices, including its first smart glasses to rival Meta‚Äôs Ray-Bans, more powerful Macs, and artificial intelligence servers.
The smart glasses ‚Äî a first for Apple ‚Äî would rely on a specialized chip codenamed N401. The processor is based on Apple Watch chips but is further optimized for power efficiency and designed to control multiple cameras planned for the glasses, the sources said.¬†
Apple‚Äôs smart glasses will initially be non-augmented reality‚Ä¶
articles.title: Apple makes progress toward its first pair of smart glasses: Report

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Brayden Lindrea
articles.description:
The 22-year-old developer of Zerebro, who apparently committed suicide during a livestream on May 4, is actually alive, according to a San Francisco news outlet that claims they spoke to Yu outside his family home.¬†
The San Francisco Standard reporter George Kelly claimed on May 8 that he briefly spoke with Yu outside of his family‚Äôs two-story home, where the crypto influencer refused to discuss the suicide allegations and whether he had financially benefited from it.¬†
Instead, Yu reportedly said: ‚ÄúYou can see the PTSD in my eyes, right?‚Äù before asking the reporter to leave.
He was reportedly wearing a T-shirt, shorts, flip-flops and wire-rimmed glasses, possibly similar to the ones he had on while appearing to shoot himself to death during the livestream.
Jeffy Yu speaking about the futur‚Ä¶
articles.title: Zerebro dev is reportedly alive and at parents‚Äô house: Report

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Jesse Coghlan
articles.description:
A man from the US state of Virginia will spend over three decades behind bars after being convicted of sending crypto to the terrorist organization commonly known as the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria.
Federal Judge David Novak sentenced Mohammed Azharuddin Chhipa to 30 years and four months in prison on May 7 for sending over $185,000 to the Islamic State, the Department of Justice said on May 8.
Prosecutors said that from around October 2019 until October 2022, the 35-year-old Chhipa collected and sent money to female Islamic State members in Syria, which helped them escape prison camps and funded fighting.
The Justice Department said Chhipa raised funds for the United Nations-designated terror organization through social media, receiving money online or traveling hundreds of miles to a‚Ä¶
articles.title: US man who sent crypto to ISIS could remain in prison until age 65

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Martin Young
articles.description:
Rumble‚Äôs pro-crypto founder and CEO has confirmed that the firm will launch its Bitcoin and stablecoin wallet in the third quarter of this year, aimed at giving the Coinbase Wallet a run for its money.¬†
The Rumble Wallet will be launched in partnership with stablecoin issuer Tether and compete directly with Coinbase, Chris Pavlovski said in a May 9 X post.
‚ÄúOur goal is to become the most prominent non-custodial Bitcoin and stablecoin wallet, powering the creator economy,‚Äù he added.¬†
He continued to state that the Rumble Wallet will be the ‚Äúvehicle to help monetize creators better than most advertisers, especially in international markets,‚Äù though he did not provide further details other than it may support Tether Gold (XAUT) as well.¬†
Rumble Wallet. Source: Chris Pavlovski
The video stream‚Ä¶
articles.title: Rumble CEO confirms Tether-collab crypto wallet to launch in Q3

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Ciaran Lyons
articles.description:
Bitcoin mining firm MARA Holdings (MARA) nearly tripled its Bitcoin holdings over 12 months, according to its newly released Q1 results.
However, its Bitcoin production fell, and total earnings slightly missed Wall Street estimates in Q1.
MARA, formerly Marathon Digital, saw its Bitcoin (BTC) holdings increase to 47,531 BTC, up 175% from the 17,320 BTC the firm was holding at the end of Q1 2024.
MARA holdings inch closer to $5B after Bitcoin pump
MARA holds the second-largest amount of Bitcoin among all publicly traded companies, according to CoinGecko data. Strategy (MSTR) holds the number one spot with 555,450 Bitcoin.
The holdings represent a total value of approximately $4.9 billion, based on Bitcoin‚Äôs current price of $102,660 at the time of publication, according to CoinMarketCap dat‚Ä¶
articles.title: Bitcoin at $103K hurtles MARA stack toward $5B, holdings triple

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Stephen Katte
articles.description:
A crypto-skeptical commissioner at the US Securities and Exchange Commission has blasted her agency over its settlement letter that could finally end the Ripple legal saga. 
The SEC and Ripple filed a joint settlement letter in a New York court asking for the August 2024 injunction against Ripple to be dissolved and $75 million of the $125 million in civil penalties held in escrow to be returned to the crypto firm, according to a May 8 statement from the SEC.
SEC Commissioner Caroline Crenshaw blasted the pending deal in a May 8 statement, saying it would damage the regulators‚Äô ability to keep crypto firms in line and undermine the court‚Äôs ruling.
Source: James Filan
‚ÄúThis settlement, alongside the programmatic disassembly of the SEC‚Äôs crypto enforcement program, does a tremendous disservi‚Ä¶
articles.title: SEC‚Äôs Crenshaw slams Ripple settlement, warns of ‚Äòregulatory vacuum‚Äô

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Brayden Lindrea
articles.description:
Crypto exchange Coinbase‚Äôs total revenue fell 10% quarter-over-quarter to $2 billion in Q1, missing industry estimates by 4.1% as trading activity slowed across the market.
Coinbase‚Äôs net income was sliced by 95% from a near-company record $1.29 billion in Q4 to $66 million, in a large part due to Coinbase marking a $596 million paper loss on its crypto holdings. 
The firm‚Äôs earnings per share of $1.94, however, managed to beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.85 for the quarter.
Coinbase‚Äôs May 8 results also showed that transaction revenue fell 18.9% quarter-on-quarter to $1.26 billion, as did trading volumes, which dipped 10.5% to $393 billion as crypto market cap dropped by double digits over the quarter, partly attributed to the Trump administration‚Äôs tariffs.¬†
In contrast, US Presid‚Ä¶
articles.title: Coinbase revenue falls 10% in Q1, missing industry estimates

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Vince Quill
articles.description:
Tech company Meta is reportedly exploring integrating stablecoin payments into its platforms after a three-year hiatus from cryptocurrencies, Fortune reported, citing sources familiar with the matter.
The Facebook parent held talks with several crypto infrastructure firms in consultation but has not chosen a decisive course of action, according to the report.
One source said the company may take a multi-token approach and integrate support for popular stablecoins such as Tether's USDt (USDT), Circle's USD Coin (USDC) and others.
Meta is the latest tech firm to integrate or explore the use of stablecoins for payments, as they increasingly attract institutional interest and investment, causing the stablecoin market capitalization to soar past $230 billion.
An overview of the stablecoin marke‚Ä¶
articles.title: Meta exploring stablecoin integration for payouts: Report

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Cointelegraph
articles.description:
Today in crypto, SEC Commissioner Caroline Crenshaw blasted a settlement agreement between the SEC and Ripple, which she says could erode SEC lawyers‚Äô credibility in the court. Democrats in the United States block the GENIUS stablecoin bill from advancing and Coinbase has agreed to acquire crypto options trading platform Deribit in a deal worth $2.9 billion.
SEC‚Äôs Crenshaw slams Ripple settlement, warns of ‚Äúregulatory vacuum‚Äù
A crypto-skeptical commissioner at the US Securities and Exchange Commission has blasted her agency over its settlement letter that could finally end the Ripple legal saga.
The SEC and Ripple filed a joint settlement letter in a New York court asking for the August 2024 injunction against Ripple to be dissolved and $75 million of the $125 million in civil penalties he‚Ä¶

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Vince Quill
articles.description:
Wellgistics Health, a healthcare infrastructure company, will integrate XRP (XRP) and related technologies into its payment network to streamline transactions between pharmacies, medical suppliers and prescription medication manufacturers, the company said in an announcement on May 8. 
Wellgistics cited the finality time of XRP transactions and reduced transaction costs, which are fractions of a penny, compared to legacy financial architecture like automated clearinghouse (ACH) payments or wire transfers, as reasons for using XRP. Brian Norton, CEO of Wellgistics Health, said in the announcement:
"I believe that the future winners in healthcare will not be the companies with the biggest buildings, they will be those with the fastest rails, cleanest data, and most efficient platforms. We ar‚Ä¶
articles.title: Wellgistics Health to integrate XRP into payment infrastructure

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Alex O‚ÄôDonnell
articles.description:
Coinbase‚Äôs agreement to buy Deribit highlights the increasing importance of financial derivatives for cryptocurrency exchanges, according to industry executives.¬†
On May 8, Coinbase, the US‚Äôs largest crypto exchange by trading volume, agreed to acquire crypto derivatives platform Deribit for $2.9 billion in the crypto industry‚Äôs largest corporate acquisition to date.¬†¬†
The deal reflects increasing competition among digital asset exchanges and brokerages ‚Äî including Coinbase, Kraken and Robinhood ‚Äî to dominate the burgeoning crypto derivatives market.¬†
"Global derivatives trading is a key driver of growth for Coinbase,‚Äù Spencer Yang, co-founder of Fractal Bitcoin, a Bitcoin scaling solution, told Cointelegraph.
Coinbase agreed to buy Deribit on May 8. Source: Coinbase
The merger established‚Ä¶
articles.title: Coinbase‚Äôs Deribit buy shows growing derivatives market

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Marcel Pechman
articles.description:
Key takeaways:

97% of the $8.3 billion in Bitcoin put options expire worthless at a $102,000 BTC price.

Short covering above $105,000 could trigger a Bitcoin price rally to new highs.

Bitcoin (BTC) soared above $101,000 on May 8, reaching its highest level in over three months. The 4.6% daily BTC price gain triggered $205 million in liquidations of bearish futures positions and eroded the value of nearly every put (sell) option. Traders now question whether Bitcoin is poised to break its $109,354 all-time high in the near term.
Bitcoin put (sell) options open interest for May-June-July, USD notional. Source: Laevitas.ch
The aggregate Bitcoin put (sell) option open interest for the next three months stands at $8.3 billion, but 97% of those have been placed below $101,000 and will likely ‚Ä¶
articles.title: Bitcoin options could pave the path for new BTC price highs ‚Äî Here is how

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Turner Wright
articles.description:
Michelle Bond, the wife of former FTX Digital Markets co-CEO Ryan Salame, who faces federal campaign finance charges, is pushing for dismissal on the grounds that US prosecutors deceived her husband in a plea deal.
In a May 7 filing in the US District Court for the Southern District of New York, Bond‚Äôs lawyers reiterated some of the claims Salame made in opposing his plea deal with the government, which ultimately still led to him serving time in prison. She claimed that prosecutors obtained a deal with Salame through ‚Äústealth and deception‚Äù by allegedly agreeing they would not file charges against Bond.¬†
‚ÄúMr. Salame and Ms. Bond‚Äôs attorneys were advised that the agreement to cease investigating Ms. Bond could not be placed within the four corners of the Salame plea or other written agreem‚Ä¶
articles.title: Former FTX exec's wife says gov't ‚Äòinduced a guilty plea‚Äô

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Aaron Wood
articles.description:
The US federal court for the Southern District of New York has sentenced former Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky to 12 years in prison for fraud. 
Mashinsky‚Äôs legal team sought a light sentence. They highlighted his spotless record before the Celsius incident, along with his military service and willingness to plead guilty. But US prosecutors were less inclined to leniency, suggesting on April 28 that the judge deliver a 20-year sentence for his actions.
Betting markets predicted a light sentence ahead of the May 8 hearing. Polymarket showed only 11% odds for a 20-year sentence or higher.
Source: Polymarket
President Donald Trump began his second term with high-profile pardons of crypto executives, signalling that his administration may bring leniency to crypto fraudsters like Mashinsky. His sen‚Ä¶
articles.title: Mashinsky‚Äôs 12-year sentence sets tone of enforcement in Trump era

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Big Smokey
articles.description:
Key takeaways: 

Bitcoin rallies to $101,707 against a backdrop of strong fundamentals in the regulatory and traditional finance space.

Traders are confident that $100,000 will hold as support.

Bitcoin (BTC) price rallied above $100,000 on the heels of US President Donald Trump‚Äôs announcement of a ‚Äútrade deal‚Äù with the UK, which could possibly include the removal of the blanket 10% tariff on all imports.¬†
Frequent social posts from Trump and public comments from White House cabinet members have hinted at a handful of trade deals in negotiation with various countries, and markets have responded positively to the messaging. In addition to the UK trade deal, the US is set to meet with Chinese officials in Switzerland on May 10.
The Dow gained 500 points following the White House announcemen‚Ä¶
articles.title: Bitcoin hits $101.7K as US strategic reserve bills become law and BTC mass adoption accelerates

articles.author: Cointelegraph by Yashu Gola
articles.description:
Key takeaways:

XRP surged on May 8, boosted by risk-on sentiment following US President Donald Trump‚Äôs teased trade deal with the UK.

Whale accumulation continues, with the number of addresses holding 10,000+ XRP rising steadily on price dips.

XRP broke above a key falling wedge resistance, increasing the chances of a rally toward $2.80‚Äì$3.66.

XRP‚Äôs (XRP) price gained 7.50% on May 8 to reach an intraday high of $2.27, mirroring similar upside moves elsewhere in the cryptocurrency market.
Traders pushed the price higher amid Trump‚Äôs tariff threats, increased whale accumulation, and favorable chart technicals.
XRP/USD daily price chart. Source: TradingView
Trump‚Äôs tariff tease boosts risk appetite, helping XRP
Trump announced a ‚Äúmajor trade deal‚Äù in a social media post, announcing an Ova‚Ä¶
articles.title: Why is XRP price up today?
